snippet: Mr. Ware helped popularize the “quiet storm” sound, a mix of jazz and R&B, through collaborations with Gaye, Quincy Jones and other notables....

headline.main: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months
headline.print_headline: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months

lead_paragraph: Mr. Ware helped popularize the “quiet storm” sound, a mix of jazz and R&B, through collaborations with Gaye, Quincy Jones and other notables.
